ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISBLANK(MailingStreet), OR(ISBLANK(MailingPostalCode), OR(ISBLANK(MailingCity), OR(ISBLANK(MailingState), OR(ISBLANK(MailingCountry)))))), RecordType.Name = "MobilePhoneContact", $Profile.Name <> "Administrador del sistema", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" )
